ruleExplore.author: {{baseUrl.match(/\/e\//)?java.getString('span@text'):""}}{{$.author||""}}
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍\n当前为按${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"肉量":($.sortType=="score"?"评分":($.sortType=="word"?"字数":($.sortType=="update"?"更新":"ID")))}${$.order?"⬆️正":"⬇️倒"}序排列`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\n❎本地数据未找到，请切换搜索接口")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
try{
	v = checkData()
	id=String(e.select('[property="og:novel:read_url"]').attr("content")).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
	v.books[id]={author:e.select('[property="og:novel:author"]').attr("content"),category:Object.values(e.select(".categories a").textNodes()),cover:String(e.select('[property="og:image"]').attr("content")).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,""),intro:e.select('.book-desc').textNodes().toArray().join(""),name:e.select('[property="og:novel:book_name"]').attr("content"),pornrate:e.select('.pornrate dd').text(),score:Number(e.select('.score dd').text()),status:e.select('[property="og:novel:status"]').attr("content"),tags:Object.values(e.select('.tag a').textNodes()),update:String(e.select('.new dd').textNodes()[0]).trim(),word:e.select(".wordcount dd").text()}
	setv(v)
} catch(error) {
	java.log(error)
}
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\n✅目录乱序修复已开启")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/第(\d+)(-\d+)?章/);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = chapters
}
chapterData
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
